Posts.Content: Hi hun sounds like your in the same position as me I'm getting my results on Thursday did u have a fine needle biopsy and if so was it clear ,?
Posts.Title: Awaiting results senital lymph node

Posts.Content: Hi lady's I'm new to the group  I'm 31 from southport England and got diagnosed with ductal carcinoma grade 2 a month ago I've had my surgery 10 days ago and am awaiting my results from my senital lymph node biopsy hoping it's not spread I had a fine needle biopsy and it was clear but still have to wait and see then I have to wait for the onca type to see if I need chemo I'm hoping not but I have to wait and see the waiting is really hard for me and I'm getting stressed while trying to hope for the best xx anyone else had a fine needle negative then senital come back positive??
Posts.Title: Awaiting results senital lymph node

Posts.Content: Yeh I had that feeling I'm recovering well the scar is so small he did a fabulous job the senital lymph nodes been taken out will hurt more that the actual lumpectomy but it's been 11 days now and I'm back doing housework hope your surgery goes well and wish you the best of luck with your biopsy I'm really worrying about my result but whatever will be will be I have no choice and it's hard to accept that xx  Let me know how you get on  Leanne xx
Posts.Title: Awaiting results senital lymph node

Posts.Content: i just  wanted some advice on how to cope with this I'm really scared of what the future holds

Posts.Title: Hi I've just been diagnosed with dcis I'm 31 and am awaiting an op...

Posts.Content: Ahh hi Hun yes it's been an emotional wait until I had my surgery I'm 6 days post op and am feeling better because it's out of me u have to go back next Thursday to see if but has spread to my lymph nodes  But on fine needle biopsy it was negative so I'm hoping for a negative result and I'm hoping for just radiation but if it had to be chemo then it has to be as long as I'm alive at the end of it il be happy I hope all goes well with you and your operation you will feel much better after surgery  And thanks for the reply it really helps talking to others in the same boat  Where are you from ?  Leanne xx

Posts.Title: Pre op today can't wait to get it out

Posts.Title: Pre op today can't wait to get it out

Posts.Content: Hi Hun I’ve had my surgery Monday the feeling that it’s out of me is just amazing you will be there before you know it hope all goes well let me know how your feeling and when your op is where here to support each other and we will be fine xx Leanne
Posts.Title: Pre op today can't wait to get it out

Posts.Title: Pre op today can't wait to get it out

Posts.Content: I went for my pre op today for dcis they said my ER was negative not really sure what that means everything seems positive my lymph node biopsy was negative but there going to test again after surgery I'm in next Monday can't help but worrying about them testing positive .did you all feel like you might have it all over your body I'm feeling panicky and think my minds playing tricks on me x
